trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SEQ_00<tab>You needn't be an entelechy to feel the weight bearing down on Hermes.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Meteion and have her accompany you.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_01<tab>Examine flowers at the Twelve Wonders while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_02<tab>Look for flowers while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_03<tab>Look for flowers while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_04<tab>Look for flowers while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_05<tab>Look for flowers while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_06<tab>Look for flowers while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_07<tab>Look for flowers while accompanied by Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Meteion.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_000<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_HERMES_000_010<tab>I fear this discussion may take a while, during which time...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_HERMES_000_011<tab>Meteion? Are you feeling unwell?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_012<tab>It's not me, Hermes. It's you...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_013<tab>I won't go to the meeting. I'll stay with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_HERMES_000_014<tab>Loath though I am to impose, may I leave Meteion in your care again?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_HERMES_000_015<tab>I'm in your debt. If you'll excuse me...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_020<tab>Can you help me with something, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_021<tab>The meeting will make Hermes sad. I want to cheer him up. With a flower.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_022<tab>Hermes likes flowers the most. Of all the creations in Elpis.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_023<tab>Most creations are expected to be interesting. Or beautiful. Or strong. Better in some way.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_024<tab>But flowers are different. They're designed to suit our emotions. What we feel and want to convey. Hermes likes that.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_025<tab>I can't make flowers. So I'll search for one. And I want you to search with me.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_026<tab>Let's start here. At the Twelve Wonders.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>Meteion is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_028<tab>You can leave Meteion behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>If you wish to have Meteion accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_Q1_000_040<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A1_000_041<tab>Talk.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A1_000_042<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A1_000_043<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_044<tab>Let's search the Twelve Wonders first.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_Q2_000_050<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Meteion?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_051<tab>All right! I'll wait at the building.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_055<tab>Hermes is still talking. We still have time!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Meteion has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before you examine the flowers.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>You should have Meteion accompanying you before you examine the flowers.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>Vibrant purple flowers bigger than your hands adorn the tree.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_072<tab>Oooh, so big and bright! I love them!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_073<tab>...But they might be too bright. You have to think of the recipient. That's what Hermes said.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_074<tab>Let's head outside next. Don't worry─we won't wander far.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>A tall, slender tree rises before you. You crane your neck to look for flowers.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_081<tab>No flowers... If there were apples, we could've covered them in syrup...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_082<tab>Let's head outside next. Don't worry─we won't wander far.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_090<tab>Lots of flowers in the fields. We should be able to find something nice!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You should have Meteion accompanying you before you look for flowers.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_105<tab>An array of beautiful flowers grow in the bed, their mix of colors forming a pattern.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_106<tab>These would be better for Hermes...but they're hedged in.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_107<tab>That means we shouldn't touch them. They're either under observation or poisonous.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_108<tab>Any other place should be fine, though. Let's keep looking!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_110<tab>Vibrant or subdued...? Interesting or plain...? Hmmm...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>Set on a tall, thin stalk, the oddly shaped flower is mesmerizing in its undulations...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_121<tab>Oh, a coneion! A flower that can move!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_122<tab>When Hermes wasn't looking, it shot seeds at him. Not a good gift, maybe...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_123<tab>But you're good, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─at spotting flowers! We'll find something soon!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_130<tab>You're good at observing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Just like an observer!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>You spy nothing promising nearby. At best, common-looking grasses with some few tiny flowers...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_141<tab>Hmmm, nothing around here... Ah!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_142<tab>Over there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Something big! Huge!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_150<tab>Come on, let's get closer! But not too close!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_160<tab>A terrible stench reminiscent of sodden old boots pervades the air... Without a doubt, the culprit is the morbol-like creature before you.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_161<tab>It's an adonis! The things around its mouth look like petals. But the flowers are the orbs on its head!

TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_162<tab>When Hermes inspected it, it swallowed him up. He didn't leave his room for days. What do you think, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Would he like it?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_Q3_000_163<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A3_000_164<tab>It's probably not the good sort of memory...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A3_000_165<tab>I'd rather not go near that thing...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_166<tab>So not this one either...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_167<tab>Finding a good flower... It's harder than I thought.

TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_168<tab>I'm sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but could we search a little more? Maybe as far as the fields over there. I'll pick something after that, I promise.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_170<tab>I've never given a gift before... Were you nervous too? For your first time?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_SYSTEM_000_180<tab>Lush, green fields stretch out before you, ending where the sky begins...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_181<tab>Awww... There's nothing...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_182<tab>...Hm? The shiny thing over there. What could it be?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_190<tab>I learned something new recently─the meaning of Philomythes Notos!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_191<tab>“Notos” is a south wind person...and “Philomythes” is his joy! Why is he joyful? Because this place is so beautiful!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_200<tab>Ooh, Elpis flowers! They're here too!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_201<tab>Hermes likes and dislikes them. At the same time.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_202<tab>Like me, they're entelechies. Like me, they feel his pain and turn dark...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_203<tab>That's only for Hermes, though. For others, they're always white and bright.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_204<tab>Truly!? The flower was dark in your home!?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_205<tab>Then...do you have it too? A dark emotion?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_Q4_000_206<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A4_000_207<tab>I've known the pain and sorrow of loss.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A4_000_208<tab>I've felt great fury and frustration.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A4_000_209<tab>I've been plagued by doubt and anxiety.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_A4_000_210<tab>I daresay I have a few.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_211<tab>I see...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_212<tab>Hermes has known the same. The feeling that a part of you is gone. Again and again. But no one notices...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_213<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Won't you lend it to me? Your pain and sorrow...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_214<tab>I see...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_215<tab>Hermes has felt the same. A fire burning in your breast. A trembling hand. But no one understands...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_216<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Won't you lend them to me? Your fury and frustration...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_217<tab>I see...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_218<tab>Hermes has felt the same. A shortness of breath. The walls closer and closer. But only him. No one else feels it...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_219<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Won't you lend them to me? Your doubt and anxiety...
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_220<tab>You don't have to say it. I can feel it's something you want to hide.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_221<tab>But won't you lend it to me? The darkness inside you?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_222<tab>I want you to make the flower dark. In front of Hermes.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_223<tab>He has been in a dark place. Since before he created me. He needs to know that he isn't there alone. That others are sad too.
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_224<tab>Truly? You'll do it?
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_225<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank you! It means more to me than I can say!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_226<tab>I can't wait to see how Hermes reacts! Let's go back and fetch him!
TEXT_AKTKME109_04427_METEION_000_230<tab>It seems they're still talking. Let's wait until they've finished.
